data.textUthmani: أَفَرَءَيْتَ ٱلَّذِى كَفَرَ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا وَقَالَ لَأُوتَيَنَّ مَالًا وَوَلَدًا
data.wordByWord: أَفَرَءَيْتَ [Then, have you seen] ٱلَّذِى [he who] كَفَرَ [disbelieved] بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا [in Our Verses] وَقَالَ [and said] لَأُوتَيَنَّ [Surely, I will be given] مَالًۭا [wealth] وَوَلَدًا [and children]
data.transliteration: Afaraayta allathee kafara bi-ayatinawaqala laootayanna malan wawalada

data.textUthmani: أَطَّلَعَ ٱلْغَيْبَ أَمِ ٱتَّخَذَ عِندَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ عَهْدًا
data.wordByWord: أَطَّلَعَ [Has he looked] ٱلْغَيْبَ [(into) the unseen] أَمِ [or] ٱتَّخَذَ [has he taken] عِندَ [from] ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ [the Most Gracious] عَهْدًۭا [a promise]
data.transliteration: AttalaAAa alghayba ami ittakhathaAAinda arrahmani AAahda

data.textUthmani: كَلَّا ۚ سَنَكْتُبُ مَا يَقُولُ وَنَمُدُّ لَهُۥ مِنَ ٱلْعَذَابِ مَدًّا
data.wordByWord: كَلَّا ۚ [Nay] سَنَكْتُبُ [We will record] مَا [what] يَقُولُ [he says] وَنَمُدُّ [and We will extend] لَهُۥ [for him] مِنَ [from] ٱلْعَذَابِ [the punishment] مَدًّۭا [extensively]
data.transliteration: Kalla sanaktubu ma yaqooluwanamuddu lahu mina alAAathabi madda

data.wordByWord: وَنَرِثُهُۥ [And We will inherit (from) him] مَا [what] يَقُولُ [he says] وَيَأْتِينَا [and he will come to Us] فَرْدًۭا [alone]

words.translation: and he will come to Us

data.textUthmani: وَٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ ءَالِهَةً لِّيَكُونُوا۟ لَهُمْ عِزًّا
data.wordByWord: وَٱتَّخَذُوا۟ [And they have taken] مِن [besides Allah] دُونِ [besides Allah] ٱللَّهِ [besides Allah] ءَالِهَةًۭ [gods] لِّيَكُونُوا۟ [that they may be] لَهُمْ [for them] عِزًّۭا [an honor]
data.transliteration: Wattakhathoo min dooni Allahialihatan liyakoonoo lahum AAizza

data.textUthmani: كَلَّا ۚ سَيَكْفُرُونَ بِعِبَادَتِهِمْ وَيَكُونُونَ عَلَيْهِمْ ضِدًّا
data.wordByWord: كَلَّا ۚ [Nay] سَيَكْفُرُونَ [they will deny] بِعِبَادَتِهِمْ [their worship (of them)] وَيَكُونُونَ [and they will be] عَلَيْهِمْ [against them] ضِدًّا [opponents]

data.textUthmani: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَا ٱلشَّيَـٰطِينَ عَلَى ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ تَؤُزُّهُمْ أَزًّا
data.wordByWord: أَلَمْ [Do not] تَرَ [you see] أَنَّآ [that We] أَرْسَلْنَا [[We] have sent] ٱلشَّيَـٰطِينَ [the devils] عَلَى [upon] ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ [the disbelievers] تَؤُزُّهُمْ [inciting them] أَزًّۭا [(with) incitement]
data.transliteration: Alam tara anna arsalna ashshayateenaAAala alkafireena taozzuhum azza

data.textUthmani: فَلَا تَعْجَلْ عَلَيْهِمْ ۖ إِنَّمَا نَعُدُّ لَهُمْ عَدًّا
data.wordByWord: فَلَا [So (do) not] تَعْجَلْ [make haste] عَلَيْهِمْ ۖ [against them] إِنَّمَا [Only] نَعُدُّ [We count] لَهُمْ [for them] عَدًّۭا [a number]
data.transliteration: Fala taAAjal AAalayhim innamanaAAuddu lahum AAadda

data.textUthmani: يَوْمَ نَحْشُرُ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ إِلَى ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ وَفْدًا
data.wordByWord: يَوْمَ [(The) Day] نَحْشُرُ [We will gather] ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ [the righteous] إِلَى [to] ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ [the Most Gracious] وَفْدًۭا [(as) a delegation]
وَنَسُوقُ [And We will drive] ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ [the criminals] إِلَىٰ [to] جَهَنَّمَ [Hell] وِرْدًۭا [thirsty]

data.textUthmani: لَّا يَمْلِكُونَ ٱلشَّفَـٰعَةَ إِلَّا مَنِ ٱتَّخَذَ عِندَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ عَهْدًا
data.wordByWord: لَّا [Not] يَمْلِكُونَ [they will have the power] ٱلشَّفَـٰعَةَ [(of) the intercession] إِلَّا [except] مَنِ [(he) who] ٱتَّخَذَ [has taken] عِندَ [from] ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ [the Most Gracious] عَهْدًۭا [a covenant]
data.transliteration: La yamlikoona ashshafaAAatailla mani ittakhatha AAinda arrahmaniAAahda

data.wordByWord: وَقَالُوا۟ [And they say] ٱتَّخَذَ [Has taken] ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ [the Most Gracious] وَلَدًۭا [a son]
لَّقَدْ [Verily] جِئْتُمْ [you have put forth] شَيْـًٔا [a thing] إِدًّۭا [atrocious]

data.textUthmani: تَكَادُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتُ يَتَفَطَّرْنَ مِنْهُ وَتَنشَقُّ ٱلْأَرْضُ وَتَخِرُّ ٱلْجِبَالُ هَدًّا
data.wordByWord: تَكَادُ [Almost] ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتُ [the heavens] يَتَفَطَّرْنَ [get torn] مِنْهُ [therefrom] وَتَنشَقُّ [and splits asunder] ٱلْأَرْضُ [the earth] وَتَخِرُّ [and collapse] ٱلْجِبَالُ [the mountain] هَدًّا [(in) devastation]
data.transliteration: Takadu assamawatuyatafattarna minhu watanshaqqu al-ardu watakhirrualjibalu hadda

data.wordByWord: أَن [That] دَعَوْا۟ [they invoke] لِلرَّحْمَـٰنِ [to the Most Gracious] وَلَدًۭا [a son]

data.textUthmani: وَمَا يَنۢبَغِى لِلرَّحْمَـٰنِ أَن يَتَّخِذَ وَلَدًا
data.wordByWord: وَمَا [And not] يَنۢبَغِى [is appropriate] لِلرَّحْمَـٰنِ [for the Most Gracious] أَن [that] يَتَّخِذَ [He should take] وَلَدًا [a son]

data.textUthmani: إِن كُلُّ مَن فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ إِلَّآ ءَاتِى ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ عَبْدًا
data.wordByWord: إِن [Not] كُلُّ [all] مَن [who] فِى [(are) in] ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ [the heavens] وَٱلْأَرْضِ [and the earth] إِلَّآ [but] ءَاتِى [(will) come] ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ [(to) the Most Gracious] عَبْدًۭا [(as) a slave]
data.transliteration: In kullu man fee assamawatiwal-ardi illa atee arrahmaniAAabda

data.wordByWord: لَّقَدْ [Verily] أَحْصَىٰهُمْ [He has enumerated them] وَعَدَّهُمْ [and counted them] عَدًّۭا [a counting]
وَكُلُّهُمْ [And all of them] ءَاتِيهِ [(will) come (to) Him] يَوْمَ [(on the) Day] ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ [(of) the Resurrection] فَرْدًا [alone]
